metadata.title: CVE-2024-27049 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:mt76: mt7925e: fix use-after-free in free_irq() From commit a304e1b82808("[PATCH] Debug shared irqs"), there is a test to make sure the shared irqhandler should be able to handle the unexpected event after deregistration.For this case, let's apply MT76_REMOVED flag to indicate the device wasremoved and do not run into the resource access anymore.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
